On 19 February, a Chinese briefing reported CQ as a successful treatment regimen in greater than 100 patients infected with COVID-19.
53 The patients showed improvements in lung function demonstrated by radiological evidence, viral clearance, and slowing of disease progression. They recommended CQ to be listed in the standard Guidelines for management of COVID-19-associated pneumonia in the National Health Commission, China, based on the successful outcomes in terms of safety and efficacy within the country.
